question: Which country was the top trading partner of India in 2019-20, as per the recent data released by Commerce Industry?
explanation:
According to the data of the commerce ministry, the United States was the top trading partner for the second consecutive fiscal in 2019-20.
In the year 2019-20, the bilateral trade between the US and India was at USD 88.75 billion compared to USD 87.96 billion in 2018-19. China was Indiaâ€™s top trading partner from 2013 to 2017. The US surpassed China to become the top trading partner of India in 2018-19.
